channel.title: DragonEmpire Needing Developers (Coder, Modeller, Hoster)
channel.description:
Well I am Axel Müller and I am the owner of Dragon Empire, i started with the idea thats its gonna be big! I started with Minecraft servers wich they are still online, It started with 1 Server then it ended with 5 servers, but it got boring and now i want to add Runescape Private servers to the Network. [b][size=12pt] My list of RSPS's are:[/size][/b] [b][size=10pt]-Regular 317 server[/size][/b] This server will be a normal 317 server with some fun minigames and such! [b][size=10pt]-Customs Server[/size][/b] This server will have loads of custom items, npc and maps! it will be liked by kids and people that are up for something new! the Custom items can be found by killing npc's and bosses!
Updates: 30/03/2014 -Downloaded ChristmaScape Client and Source. -Edited it, changed names, modified client. -Added ::yell titles such as Donator, Moderator and Owner! 1/04/2014 -Removed the custom items out of the general store and added a few basic stuff in it, and enabled the pssibility to sell items in it. -Added a new currency wich will be used to buy rares and sell rares for! -Added a Super Rare shop (DE Tokens Shop) "Dragon Empire Tokens" -Added ::Pyramid wich holds a Giant Skeleton 10k hp awesome drops. (Big Bones Always GP 75.000/500.000/1.000.000 Common 3 Types of LightSabers RARE Full statius RARE 1-4 DragonEmpire Tickets) -Added 2 new npc at ::home (Shop keeper and Shop assistant) -Added 1 new npc at ::home (Fairy Shop keeper) Holds the "DragonEmpire Tokens shop" 2/04/2014 -Added 5 New custom items. Dclaws | Sheep mask | Cat mask | Bat mask | Wolf mask
[b][size=10pt]-PK/PVP server[/size][/b] This will be a server wich basically is based on PK/PVP. it'll have variating pkpoint shops and some pk item bags with stuff in it! The more kills the better rank u get. Better rank ? better kits!
2/04/2014 -Using ChristmaScape Server And client. -Removed Custom items from the client. -Changed names from client and server side.
[b]===============================================================[/b] These are all gonna be Delta 317 sources. Requirements: -Skype. (my skype is "Supercrafter4") -Dropbox. [size=10pt][b]Current Developers:[/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qG7DzAK.gif[/img] DragonEmpire (Client, Server Coder, WebDevelopment (HTML, PHP and such) [img]http://i.imgur.com/qG7DzAK.gif[/img] Erik (Server Coder, WebDevelopment (HTML, PHP and such) If you are known to these things please fill one of these in: [b]Modelling and ints.[/b]
Name?: Skype?: Age?: Why?: Expirience?:
[b]Programming (Clientside).[/b]
Name?: Skype?: Age?: Why?: Expirience?:
[b] Programming (Sourceside)[/b]
Name?: Skype?: Age?: Why?: Expirience?: MySQL?:
[b]Hosting:[/b]
Name?: Skype?: Age?: Why?: Expirience?: 24/7?:
[b]Graphics (Banners, Clientbackgrounds and such)[/b]
Name?: Skype?: Age?: Why?: Expirience?: Some of your work?:

item.title: DragonEmpire Needing Developers (Coder, Modeller, Hoster)
item.dc:creator: @MooNkEeY MooNkEeY
item.description:
@MooNkEeY wrote:

I’m having 3 servers under development now wich i want to get hosted for players to preview them allready!
my development post: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,660535.0.html
i basicly need 1 or 3 hosters thazt host my servers, i hope for just one …
if you can host 24/7 please reply or add me on skype ‘supercrafter4’

You will get rewarded!

Read full topic

item.title: DragonEmpire Needing Developers (Coder, Modeller, Hoster)
item.dc:creator: @MooNkEeY MooNkEeY
item.description:
@MooNkEeY wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:541666”][quote author=MooNkEeY link=topic=660535.msg4416497#msg4416497 date=1396143181]

Lets not be pessimistic about the whole idea, also i have removed your link until you get it approved by a global mod.

well one server (Customs) is up allready not totally done but its up …
[/quote]

Server Advertisements

I wish you luck.[/quote]
Thanks a lot, well it wasnt up yet the hoster we had thought it was --’, but we did some changes, added customs and stuff.
Made some new interfaces, lots new stuff!

Read full topic

@MooNkEeY wrote:

Well I am Axel Müller and I am the owner of Dragon Empire, i started with the idea thats its gonna be big!
I started with Minecraft servers wich they are still online, It started with 1 Server then it ended with 5 servers, but it got boring and now i want to add Runescape Private servers to the Network.
[size=12pt]
My list of RSPS’s are:[/size]
[size=10pt]-Regular 317 server[/size]
This server will be a normal 317 server with some fun minigames and such!
[size=10pt]-Customs Server[/size]
This server will have loads of custom items, npc and maps!
it will be liked by kids and people that are up for something new!
the Custom items can be found by killing npc’s and bosses!

Updates: 30/03/2014 -Downloaded ChristmaScape Client and Source. -Edited it, changed names, modified client. -Added ::yell titles such as Donator, Moderator and Owner! 1/04/2014 -Removed the custom items out of the general store and added a few basic stuff in it, and enabled the pssibility to sell items in it. -Added a new currency wich will be used to buy rares and sell rares for! -Added a Super Rare shop (DE Tokens Shop) "Dragon Empire Tokens" -Added ::Pyramid wich holds a Giant Skeleton 10k hp awesome drops. Dclaws | Sheep mask | Cat mask | Bat mask | Wolf mask
[b][size=10pt]-PK/PVP server[/size][/b] This will be a server wich basically is based on PK/PVP. it'll have variating pkpoint shops and some pk item bags with stuff in it! The more kills the better rank u get. Better rank ? better kits!
